synopsis.text: He ading back to the 19th century in the Belgian countryside, we meet Nello, a young boy with a knack for art who lives with his loving grandfather, Alois. After losing his parents, Nello's life takes a turn for the better when he discovers an injured dog, Patrasche, who becomes his inseparable companion. Together, they navigate the challenges of poverty by selling milk in a nearby town, with Patrasche providing much-needed assistance by pulling the milk cart. Despite the hardships they face, Nello and Patrasche share an unbreakable bond that brings joy and meaning to their lives. However, two particular episodes in their journey were never aired on Japanese television, leaving viewers outside Japan to uncover their unique story.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
